column5: Specifics in the title/subject line. I have one/two open seats. Will be going solo irregardless. You will need your PCOC, fishing license of course and a GOSD ticket would be a bonus (but not required). If your interested, PM your cell & email addy before noon tomorrow (Wed Aug 8).  Weather is looking very favorable with light winds. No tackle required.  Simon

I wish I could join you for an evening of Salmon hunting, since I've only gone once when I was like 13... and only caught a 7 or 8 lber. But I gots a family dinner to attend. If you ever need a seat filler and have the necessary tackle, I would totally be down.
I'm in! Same Bat dock, same Bat channel?
I'd be happy to take a seat if available Simon!
Yep, you both know where to meet. Craig, no batnanas this time LOL. Check your PM's in the mornin men
